name: Rocket Blasters
description: Rocket Blasters is a fast paced, action packed shoot-em-up set during the invasion of the Dread Pizza Armada. Its hand-drawn art gives it a unique style. Blowing stuff up has never been so fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP or later Processor: 300 MHz Pentium or Better Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 resolution 32-bit True Color - DirectX 9 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Sound Card Additional Notes: Rocket Blasters was made using GameMaker Studio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Better Processor: AMD Phenom II x4 965 Processor or Better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia G-Force GTX 770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: NVidia High Definition Audio Additional Notes: Recommended Requirements based on Computer used to test game
